name: Amanita Design two-page pitch document
description:
University assignment. November 2020

Brief:

Amanita Design want a game that fits into their catalogue of games in style and look. They would like their next game to have a junkyard as a central feature. The game should be playable on mobile as well as PC. It will be a one-off purchase with no monetisation. The game has a small team working on it, although has a number of excellent artists and asset-creators, but taking this into account is vital. The company is happy to experiment with some new modes of gameplay but it is vital to keep in with ‘their brand’
